function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Cholera and yellow fever epidemics in buenos aires between 1867 and 1871","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of disease leading to development of military cantonments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reshaping of rural landscape creating ideal habitats for disease vectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on lower-caste hindu population","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cure or vaccine for tuberculosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate environmental and behavioral interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hypochondriacal fears of europeans of catching diseases from native bodies such as malaria, cholera, and dysentery.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Miasma theories explaining disease as resultant from the bad air ’emanating directly from the earth due to heat and humidity.’","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legacy of hypochondria in the development of housing for british colonizers in tropical places.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of informal settlements despite being characterized as degenerate and associated with social and contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association of poverty, morality, and disease, leading to discriminatory urban planning and design decisions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ’surgical’ and brutal slum clearance operations in response to contagious diseases outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focussing on three very different cities -jerusalem, phnom penh and torontothey reveal how histories of colonial occupation and planning, of postcolonial economic modernization and of entrepreneurial planning geared to promoting competitive global cities have produced conditions germane to the uneven spread and impacts of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of health impacts in cities due to urban planning and interventions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for urban planning to be divisive in interpretations of appropriate spatial interventions, exacerbating social inequality.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of transmission and spread of covid-19 and other pandemics in urban environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene in victorian london","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public health infrastructure in the past","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in crowded occupational environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupational exposure to coronavirus based on job tasks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers at risk of exposure to sars-cov-2 in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to eliminate covid-19 from the workplace","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly ventilated indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in confined and crowded indoor spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in workplaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing the numbers of air exchanges","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoiding air recirculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air recirculation can transport infectious contaminants through spaces, leading to the re-entry of virus particles into workstations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to close recirculation dampers can lead to the distribution of airborne contaminants from one point to others connected to the same system.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of induction units and fan coils with local circulation may lead to the resuspension of virus particles.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient outdoor airflow can contribute to the buildup of infectious contaminants in indoor spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient social distancing among workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration leading to airborne transmission of viruses within buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misconceptions about the effectiveness of hepa filters in capturing coronaviruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited use of hepa filters in non-healthcare occupational settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to maintain social distancing in small businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of physical barriers such as plexiglass, polycarbonate, and tempered glass in various industries and healthcare centers.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of administrative controls to minimize exposure to sars-cov-2 in workplace environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of personal protective equipment ppe to prevent the transmission of contagious diseases in workplace environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to use proper ppe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper fit or seal of respirators","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated guidelines for controlling covid-19 transmission in workplaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of expert team for the implementation of effective control measures in the workplace.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unsanitary conditions in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and air circulation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
